title: The Carrots Sprouted - Part 2
author: Danny Alan
detail:
Update number 2 on the carrots! Cobe is really happy with the progress he has been making on his very on veg.

Every day, he always remembers to water both his carrots and his radishes. It's quite clear that he's got utter pride in the veg of his labour.

We will be updating you all very shortly on progress.
